titleStmt.title: A Spiritual or heavenly salutation to all the tender-hearted in Christendom that are seeking the kingdom of God and the righteousness therof which I desire and intreat them to read over these following lines in the love of God, in which they are sent to them from him that desires the good of all mankind here, and their eternal happiness hereafter / [by] George Fox.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

titleStmt.title: A Spiritual or heavenly salutation to all the tender-hearted in Christendom that are seeking the kingdom of God and the righteousness therof which I desire and intreat them to read over these following lines in the love of God, in which they are sent to them from him that desires the good of all mankind here, and their eternal happiness hereafter / [by] George Fox.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
